title: MCMMO连接MySQL报错
author: lian123456
txt_content:
[06:57:43 ERROR]: [mcMMO] Location: sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl newInstance0 -2
[06:57:43 ERROR]: [mcMMO] SQLException: SSL Connection required, but not supported by server.
[06:57:43 ERROR]: [mcMMO] SQLState: 08001
[06:57:43 ERROR]: [mcMMO] VendorError: 0
配置如下

MySQL:
    Enabled: true
    Database:
        User_Name: MCMMO
        User_Password: pass
        Name: MCMMO
        TablePrefix: mcmmo_
        # This setting is the max simultaneous mysql connections allowed at a time, needs to be
        # high enough to support multiple player logins in quick succession
        MaxConnections:
            Misc: 50
            Load: 50
            Save: 50
        # This setting is the max size of the pool of cached connections that we hold available
        # at any given time
        MaxPoolSize:
            Misc: 100
            Load: 100
            Save: 100
    Server:
        SSL: false
        Port: 3306

        Address: 127.0.0.1


CoreProtect连接MySQL报错
[06:57:51 INFO]: [CoreProtect] Unable to connect to MySQL server.

replies.author: 陈宇鹏
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.txt_content:
陈宇鹏 发表于 2019-7-12 08:05
mysql开启了吗
net start mysql
开启
10个插件只有mcmmo，coi，luckperms三个有问题。
